content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=117.5, y=-30.5), boiler(position x=111.5, y=-32.0), and offshore pump (position x=107.5, y=-33.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=60.5, y=-61.5) and a furnace at position(y=-60.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=61.5, y=-61.5) and a furnace at position(y=-60.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=62.5, y=-60.5) and a furnace at position(y=-60.0)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=60.5, y=-61.5) and a furnace at position(y=-60.0)
-  Assembling machine (not found in the logs) and inserter at position(x=60.5, y=-61.5) that puts into assembling machine
-  Belt group (position x=63.5, y=-53.5) that connects the furnace at position(y=-60.0) to assembling machine (not found in the logs)

### ERROR TIPS
*   Errors when using insert_item but having no items to insert
    *   Make sure to check the inventory before attempting to insert items
*   Errors when inserter is out of fuel
    *   Ensure the inserter has sufficient fuel before attempting to use it
*   Errors when boiler is out of fuel
    *   Ensure the boiler has sufficient fuel before attempting to use it
*   Errors when steam engine is not connected
    *   Ensure the steam engine is connected to a fluid system before attempting to use it
*   Errors when offshore pump is not connected to a pipe
    *   Ensure the offshore pump is connected to a pipe before attempting to use it

### NAMESPACE
*   Utility functions:
    *   `insert_item`: Inserts an item into an entity. Failure mode: No items to insert. Success mode: Item inserted successfully.
    *   `get_entity_position`: Gets the position of an entity. Failure mode: Entity not found. Success mode: Entity position returned successfully.
*   Important variables:
    *   `inserter_fuel`: The fuel level of the inserter. Type: `dict`
    *   `boiler_fuel`: The fuel level of the boiler. Type: `dict`
    *   `offshore_pump_fluid_box`: The fluid box of the offshore pump. Type: `list`
    *   `steam_engine_fluid_box`: The fluid box of the steam engine. Type: `list`
